items.title: Spotify reports Q3 revenue up 12% YoY to €4.3B, above €4.23B est., subscribers up 12% YoY to 281M, MAUs up 11% YoY to 713M, and a €582M operating income (Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Spotify reports Q3 revenue up 12% YoY to €4.3B, above €4.23B est., subscribers up 12% YoY to 281M, MAUs up 11% YoY to 713M, and a €582M operating income  —  Spotify Technology SA's monthly active users climbed 11% year over year to 713 million in the third quarter, exceeding analysts' estimates of 711 million.

items.title: EGO’s 56V 24-inch cordless self-propelled two-stage snow blower with 7.5Ah batteries at $1,400 (Reg. $1,649), more
items.summary:
We’ve been seeing an increase in discounts on snow-clearing solutions across multiple brands lately, and Amazon is now offering the EGO Power+ 56V 24-inch Cordless Self-Propelled Two-Stage Snow Blower with two 7.5Ah batteries at $1,399.99 shipped. Normally going for $1,649 at full price, we haven’t seen very much by way of discounts dropping the cost back at or below $1,400 since April, save for the Prime Day fall to $1,350. While it has gone lower before April, you’re still looking at a solid $249 price cut here that gives you the best rate of the last seven months. Of course, if you want to save more, there’s the brand’s 56V 21-inch Cordless Snow Blower that comes with two 5.0Ah batteries at $699 shipped right now, as well as the 56V 12-inch Cordless Snow Shovel with a 2.5Ah battery at $269.99 shipped.

more…

items.title: Let Yeedi’s S14 Plus or M12 Pro+ robots handle vacuuming and mopping at new and returning lows from $360 (Reg. $800+)
items.summary:
Update 11/3: Yeedi has dropped the price even lower on its S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop to a new all-time low of $549.99 shipped.

Through its official Amazon storefront, Yeedi is offering some serious savings on an array of robot vacuum/mops to upgrade your home cleaning routine. Among the lineup, which you can see in full here, we spotted the brand’s S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop down at $599.99 shipped. This model was released with a $1,400 price tag back in March, but has since come down to a starting $1,200 rate, with discounts having kept the price down at $700 since mid-August. Now, you can score it lower than ever – even beating Prime Day pricing – as it’s getting a 50% markdown to a new all-time low price. For folks not looking to spend so much, there’s also the M12 Pro+ robot back at its lowest $359.99 shipped pricing too. You can learn more about these two models that I highly recommend below, or check out our hands-on S14 Plus review, as well as our hands-on M12 Pro+ review.

items.title: How an ex-L3Harris Trenchant boss stole and sold cyber exploits to Russia
items.summary: Peter Williams sold eight exploits to a Russian zero-day broker by smuggling them from his employer’s highly secured air-gapped network. A court document, plus exclusive reporting by TechCrunch and interviews with former Trenchant staff, explains how Williams pulled off the heist of hacking tools.

items.title: Bluetti’s X20 153.6Wh/12,000mAh power bank can be added to your adventure kit at a $139 low (Reg. $249)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Bluetti is offering its X20 153.6Wh/12,000mAh Laptop Power Bank at $139 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct website pricing by $10. While it has a $249 full price directly from Bluetti, it sits higher for $299 at Amazon since August, with discounts having mostly dropped those costs to $149, though we did spy it dropping to this same rate for the first time during Prime Day last month, while July’s Prime Day event was the only time we saw it fall to the $99 low. The deal here gives you a 44% markdown off the going rate, saving you $110+ at the second-best price we have tracked in its history.

items.title: Govee’s Holly-Jolly bundle gives you string, icicle, and net smart lights for your holiday displays at a $150 low
items.summary:

Normally fetching $300 at full price, discounts up until last month only saw that rate going as low as $200, with it having fallen to $150 for the first time in the Prime Day window. That low price is coming back around for a second time here, giving you a 50% markdown off the full rate for $150 savings at a new all-time low price well ahead of Christmas displays going up.

items.title: Samsung’s 2025 40-inch Odyssey G7 180Hz WUHD curved gaming monitor just hit a new all-time low at $450 off
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Samsung that drops the 40-inch variant of its 2025 Odyssey G7 (G75F) 180Hz WUHD gaming monitor down to $749.99 shipped. This model launched just a few months ago with a $1,200 price tag and is now seeing a hefty $450 markdown. While it’s gone on sale a few times at Amazon since its first discount back in September, today’s deal marks its steepest drop yet to land it $50 below its previous all-time low. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
